As Hippalus mentioned in the [Ecommerce Q+A](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/H004gAPw-ecommerce-qa?comment=00350002): 

*"Yes I think Championship Riven will come back someday. Most limited edition skins took four years to come back after release, and it's been two years for Riven so far."*

Yeah, buying accounts is a bad thing for Riot. As said, they will ban those when they find them.  Only way to get the skin is to wait till 2016 when it MAY be on sale again, as that's 4 years after it's original release and it's a limited edition (as they take a certain time to come back, some not at all though)
That was very poorly written but I think you're asking what Riot's stance is on buying accounts? It's against the rules, if they find out an account has been purchased they ban it.
